title: The Buddy Goodrich Show
description: Buddy Goodrich plays a wealthy neurosurgeon and test pilot who adopts two white children. Don’t just watch for the laughs, there’s also a lesson every week.
quote: What in the world possessed you boys to bring a timber wolf into the house?
altHero: Buddy Goodrich, a black dad, with two white boy children, all wearing sweaters
alt1: Buddy talks to the boys on the couch
